snippet: The unemployment rate declined to 5.8 percent, the lowest level since July 2008, but Wall Street wanted more.
abstract: Stock market shares are mixed, with indexes making slightest of gains, despite encouraging Labor Dept report on hiring.
lead_paragraph: The unemployment rate declined to 5.8 percent, the lowest level since July 2008, but Wall Street wanted more.

headline.main: Shares Are Mixed as Jobs Report Fails to Excite Investors
headline.print_headline: Shares Are Mixed as Jobs Report Fails to Excite Investors
